    com.forgerock.opendj.cli
    Classes implementing the OpenDJ CLI shared APIs.

    • Uses of MultiColumnPrinter.Builder in com.forgerock.opendj.cli

      Methods in com.forgerock.opendj.cli that return MultiColumnPrinter.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static MultiColumnPrinter.Builder MultiColumnPrinter.builder​(PrintStream stream, List<MultiColumnPrinter.Column> columns)
      Creates a new MultiColumnPrinter.Builder to build a MultiColumnPrinter.
      MultiColumnPrinter.Builder MultiColumnPrinter.Builder.columnSeparator​(String separator)
      Sets the sequence to use to separate column.
      MultiColumnPrinter.Builder MultiColumnPrinter.Builder.format​(boolean format)
      Sets whether the MultiColumnPrinter needs to apply formatting.
      MultiColumnPrinter.Builder MultiColumnPrinter.Builder.titleAlignment​(MultiColumnPrinter.Alignment titleAlignment)
      Sets the alignment for title elements which will be printed by the MultiColumnPrinter.
